item.title: New York Starbucks image may hold key to finding healthcare CEO's killer
item.description: Police are using facial recognition software to hunt the person who shot UnitedHealthcare boss Brian Thompson.

item.title: Romania's far right presidential frontrunner vows to end Ukraine aid
item.description: Calin Georgescu, who leads Romania's presidential race, tells the BBC he would end support for Ukraine if elected.

item.title: Macron to address nation after Barnier government collapse
item.description: The prime minister will stay on as caretaker while President Emmanuel Macron chooses a successor.

item.title: Disappearances double in Sinaloa amid Mexican cartel rift
item.description: The security forces scored a victory with a huge fentanyl bust but levels of violence remain high.

item.title: Syrian rebels capture second major city after military withdraws
item.description: Hama is south of Aleppo, which the rebels seized last week after launching a lightning offensive.
